channel.title: Desert on Yannik's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Desert on Yannik's Portfolio

item.title: Apple Crumble
item.description: P-P-A-P, I have a pie, I have a apple Uh, apple-pie I have a pie, I have pineapple Uh, pineapple-pie Apple-pie, pineapple-pie

item.title: Lebkuchen Kuchen
item.description: A childhood favourite, a very juice cake that gets better with time in the fridge, as the dough soaks through and gets even juicier.

item.title: Nussecken
item.description: Still room for improvement. But generally good.
